comment: I got the opportunity to work with Dr. Chloe at XLab. She is kind and always cared about me and made sure that I could reach use of my full potential. I would definitely take professor again and doing research with her has been a wonderful experience.

Professor Chloe is awesome! She is very sweet and understanding. She gives out a fair amount of work for her class and I never felt overwhelmed. She is extremely flexible with due dates and definitely cares about your performance in her class. I recommend taking her if you can!

Professor Chloe Yixin Xie has a clear and engaging teaching style, effectively breaking down complex topics and encouraging interactive discussions, which greatly enhances understanding and retention of the material.

She was a great professor, she was very understanding when you had to turn an assignment in late but of course do not take advantage of her. I would 100% recommend taking her for a class because she is awesome!

Professor Chloe Xie breaks down complex topics into easily digestible segments, making advanced material approachable for students. Consider mentioning any interactive methods she uses, like encouraging questions, discussions, or using real-world examples to make concepts more relatable.

I loved her class. It had discussion, assignments and quizzes. all which of you can do your own research on and as long as you meet the page criteria you will get a good grade. She gave the class an option of what kind of final we wanted to majority won. she's a really good grader and fair with everything. TAKE HER

Dr. Chloe Xie excels in teaching IT 7503, employing a student-centered approach that encourages participation and collaboration. Her clear communication and well-structured materials facilitate understanding of complex healthcare IT concepts, creating an engaging and supportive learning environment for students.

Professor Chloe Xie has been an incredible mentor, particularly in guiding me through Health IT. Her teaching style is clear and approachable, with practical examples that make complex topics manageable. She's always willing to provide extra support and advice, which has greatly boosted my confidence in this field.

Professor Xie was very attentive to your needs and opened to any help you may need. I enjoy working with a professor who is willing to make sure you are successful in your school work. This was an online class and professor Xie provided material to help guide you through the course.
Very easy to access and she gives you all the attention and help you need. Always ready to assist and make you understand what she teaches.

comment:
My course was 100% online but Professor Chloe always encourage us to reach out when we need help. There were sufficient materials for each module, and halfway through the semester, Dr. Chloe started recording live lectures which was extremely helpful for working students like me. 

Overall, I enjoy the course.

Thank you, Dr. Chloe!

Dr. Chloe is a very good instructor. I am a non IT background student so the yeah she made me understand basics of python etc was really helpful. I hope to take her classes again. Highly recommended instructor.
Dr. Xie is a great professor.  She really is there to help you, and will lead you in the right direction when you ask for help, or have any type of question in this course.  Great Professor.

Professor Xie is very caring and thoughtful. Even for a entry level python class, there is a lot of practice and examples, she goes through each practice with us. The pace was great, she checks and makes sure everyone codes it correct then moves on. Ask questions, she can teach you advanced technical knowledge!
Be sincere to the class and instruction and advice of the instructor.

She is a super nice professor. I don't have an IT/CS background before I take her lectures, but I was able to follow her lectures. I found the weekly assignments and projects helpful in practice. She's a nice grader and patient with your questions.

Dr. Xie is very patient with a clear explanation of each concept. I took her online course and communicated with her using emails. She provided great help with my difficulties in understanding the assignments. Not an easy A for me, as I have ZERO coding experience. Assignments were set to be easy to challenging as the course delivers.
